    public AzureIaaSVMJob(string entityFriendlyName = null, BackupManagementType? backupManagementType = null, string operation = null, string status = null, DateTime? startTime = null, DateTime? endTime = null, string activityId = null, TimeSpan? duration = null, IList<JobSupportedAction? > actionsInfo = null, IList<AzureIaaSVMErrorInfo> errorDetails = null, string virtualMachineVersion = null, AzureIaaSVMJobExtendedInfo extendedInfo = null)Public Sub New(entityFriendlyName As String = Nothing, backupManagementType As BackupManagementType? = Nothing, operation As String = Nothing, status As String = Nothing, startTime As Date? = Nothing, endTime As Date? = Nothing, activityId As String = Nothing, duration As TimeSpan? = Nothing, actionsInfo As IList(Of JobSupportedAction?) = Nothing, errorDetails As IList(Of AzureIaaSVMErrorInfo) = Nothing, virtualMachineVersion As String = Nothing, extendedInfo As AzureIaaSVMJobExtendedInfo = Nothing)

    Parameters

    • entityFriendlyName
      String
      String

      Friendly name of the entity on which the current job is executing.

    • backupManagementType
      Nullable<BackupManagementType>
      Nullable(Of BackupManagementType)

      Backup management type to execute the current job. Possible values include: 'Invalid', 'AzureIaasVM', 'MAB', 'DPM', 'AzureBackupServer', 'AzureSql'

    • operation
      String
      String

      The operation name.

    • status
      String
      String

      Job status.

    • startTime
      Nullable<DateTime>
      Nullable(Of DateTime)

      The start time.

    • endTime
      Nullable<DateTime>
      Nullable(Of DateTime)

      The end time.

    • activityId
      String
      String

      ActivityId of job.

    • duration
      Nullable<TimeSpan>
      Nullable(Of TimeSpan)

      Time elapsed during the execution of this job.

    • actionsInfo
      IList<Nullable<JobSupportedAction>>
      IList(Of Nullable(Of JobSupportedAction))

      Gets or sets the state/actions applicable on this job like cancel/retry.

    • errorDetails
      IList<AzureIaaSVMErrorInfo>
      IList(Of AzureIaaSVMErrorInfo)

      Error details on execution of this job.

    • virtualMachineVersion
      String
      String

      Specifies whether the backup item is a Classic or an Azure Resource Manager VM.

    • extendedInfo
      AzureIaaSVMJobExtendedInfo
      AzureIaaSVMJobExtendedInfo

      Additional information for this job.
